definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
Essen, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
ETA (Euskadi Ta Askatasuna or Basque homeland and freedom), Basque armed separatist group
Eilat, Israeli port and resort on the Red sea

sentences.english: The new Enel plant here opens its first boiler in two months.
sentences.chinese: 二個月後，埃奈爾電廠的第一個新鍋爐將會啓用。

sentences.english: Many explorers hoped to discover Eldorado, the fabled City of Gold.
sentences.chinese: 冒險家都夢想找到埃爾多拉多這個傳說中的黃金之城。

sentences.english: The local superstitions regarding the dead were the perfect cover for Evazan's project.
sentences.chinese: 當地對死亡的迷信爲埃瓦讚的項目提供了完美的掩護。

sentences.english: He kept the people with Ebola separate from the other patients.
sentences.chinese: 他不停地與埃博拉從其他病人不同的人。

sentences.english: His words caused a stir among the audience.
sentences.chinese: 埃德斯坦說，這席話在觀衆中引起了一陣騷動。

sentences.english: Hi. This is Alice from Dr. Peter's office.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，你好，我是彼得診所的埃里斯。

sentences.english: Afterthe great Judge Ehud died, we were completely helpless.
sentences.chinese: 自從偉大的埃胡德逝世，我們感到很無助。

sentences.english: A. What did Aunt Ethel do yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 埃塞爾阿姨昨天做什麼了？

sentences.english: Yeah. He's always ready to help and gives a leg-up in critical time.
sentences.chinese: 是埃他總是樂於助人，常常在關鍵時刻助人一臂之力。

sentences.english: After questioning his sexuality, Emmett decides to join the group.
sentences.chinese: 埃米特在懷疑了自己的性取向後決定加入這個組織。

sentences.english: That was the last time Ylang and Edo saw eachother.
sentences.chinese: 這是依蘭和埃都的最後一次見面。

sentences.english: Ewald and Weiss speak of the miracles of Christ as a daily task.
sentences.chinese: 埃瓦爾德和韋斯說的是基督的奇蹟作爲日常的任務。

sentences.english: Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan visited the Van region and Ercis by helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 總理埃爾多安乘坐直升機訪問了凡省和埃爾季什鎮。

sentences.english: I was lured to the Enfield store by the Krispy Kreme website.
sentences.chinese: 我是被卡卡圈坊官網上的話吸引到埃菲爾德分店的。

sentences.english: We don't know much about quality of the Steinway instrument under the Selmer regime.
sentences.chinese: 我們不太瞭解儀器施坦威的質量在埃政權。

sentences.english: Alexandra was to hear more of Ivar's case .
sentences.chinese: 亞歷山德拉仍不免會聽到更多有關埃法爾的話題。

definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
rad (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Caltrop or puncture vine (Tribulus terrestris)/to thatch (a roof)
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
